title: LoL Launcher not working properly any fixes?
body: Hey guys my LoL Launcher seems to not be working when i go to open the game the icon comes up briefly then disappears and nothing.. before this the game seemed to be lagging really bad for a couple days but figured it was just bad connection or something..i have tried the usual methods to correct this like uninstall pando media booster,run as administrator,checking for already running program,restarts,reinstalling the game 5 times and uninstalling the launcher nothing even looks like it will work...does anyone have this same problem or has had this problem and knows a fix?

replies.body:
Hey dylan87,

Please try the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article and let me know if anything works for you.
